pr_title: Avoid NPE with -verbose:stacktrace when source location is null

timeline.message:

timeline.bodyText: Since we are here, please change it to Sidecar18-SE, other than that, it looks good.
timeline.author: JasonFengJ9

replies.bodyText: Any reason not to use JAVA_SPEC_VERSION >= 8?
replies.author: pshipton
